verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: hit] out [ARG1: against European Union and Canadian leaders] [ARGM-TMP: before having to meet them at the G-7 summit in Quebec] . Tensions are mounting as the US announced steep tariffs on US , EU , and Mexican steel and aluminum last week . EU and Canadian leaders appear ready to unite against Trump .

President Donald Trump hit out against European Union and Canadian leaders before [V: having] to meet them at the G-7 summit in Quebec .
